message:
All work is complete.

What I delivered:
- Efficient solution: /workspace/solution.py (Fenwick tree over adjacency array; updates toggle up to two positions; queries check sum==0).
- Test harness used during verification: /workspace/tests.py.
- Evaluation of the original naive solution: /workspace/evaluation.txt.

Notes:
- Correctness verified with sample + extensive randomized tests.
- Micro-benchmark with N=200k, Q=200k completed quickly in this environment.
- Complexity: O((N + Q) log N) time, O(N) memory.

No further action is required.
